analysis:
Entries in art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last six years. The -37.2% change compared to a change of -27.5% in all AS-Level entries over the last six years. Over the same period, the 17-year-old population has changed by approximately 10.2%.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in art and design subjects in 2024 as did so across all AS-Level subjects. A total of 24.1% of pupils achieved A grades in art and design subjects compared to 23.8% for all subjects.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in biology in 2024 as did so across all AS-Level subjects. A total of 22.7% of pupils achieved A grades in biology compared to 23.8% for all subjects.
